publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-340 Aileen Campbell: Homeless World Cup Squad Victory—That the Parliament congratulates Scotland’s Homeless World Cup squad for winning the recently held tournament in Denmark and applauds the work and effort put in by staff at The Big Issue and the players in securing this well-earned victory. Supported by: Bob Doris*

S3M-340 Homeless World Cup Squad Victory (lodged on 7 August 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jim Hume*, Kenneth Gibson*, Karen Gillon*, Keith Brown*, Nigel Don*, Bill Kidd*, Liam McArthur*, Mary Scanlon*, Sandra White*, Stefan Tymkewycz*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ken Macintosh*, Ian McKee*, Nanette Milne*, Robin Harper*, Angela Constance*, Christina McKelvie*, Patrick Harvie*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Wilson*, Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-340 Homeless World Cup Squad Victory (lodged on 7 August 2007) Dave Thompson*, John Park*, Gil Paterson*, Cathy Peattie*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-340 Homeless World Cup Squad Victory (lodged on 7 August 2007) Brian Adam*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-340 Homeless World Cup Squad Victory (lodged on 7 August 2007) Jack McConnell*
